product_name: Louis Garneau Nova Bike Vest - Men's
long_description: The men's wind-resistant Louis Garneau Nova Bike Vest protects your core from chill and provides sweat-wicking mesh where you need it most. You'll want it for rides as well as runs. Polyester shell is lighweight and breathable for comfort. Light Mesh Airdry(R) in the underarm area extending into the back, and lining the collar, wicks moisture to dry fast. Micromesh back panel wicks moisture and dries fast. Full-front zipper allows maximum ventilation; inner flap protects against the wind; zipper garage protects the neck. Stretch trim provides a good fit. Reflective piping on the back and reflective accents front and back enhance your visibility in low light. Louis Garneau Nova Bike Vest for men features 2 rear pockets.
short_description: The men's wind-resistant Louis Garneau Nova Bike Vest protects your core from chill and provides sweat-wicking mesh where you need it most. You'll want it for rides as well as runs.
